document.full_text: american bubba watson shrugged off a dose of post-masters rust and eagled the par-five 11th on his way to a share of the lead in the opening round of the new orleans classic thursday.
document.title: no post-masters blues for pacesetting watson in new orleans
lines_and_colors: american bubba watson shrugged off a dose of post-masters rust and eagled the par-five 11th on his way to a share of the lead in the opening round of the new orleans classic thursday.
